channel.title: DeltaScape P Rights

item.title: DeltaScape P Rights
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“ban”) && playerRights > 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(4);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

			if (otherPIndex != -1) {
				client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

				writeLog(p.playerName, "bans");
				p.disconnected = true;
				sM("You have banned "+p.playerName+"!");
			} else { 
				sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
			}
		} catch (Exception e) { 
			sM("Try entering a name you want to ban..");
		}
	}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: DeltaScape P Rights
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

So, Mods on Deltascape can Ban…
Here is the Ban command.

[code] if (command.startsWith(“ban”) && playerRights > 0) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

		writeLog(p.playerName, "bans");
		p.disconnected = true;
		sM("You have banned "+p.playerName+"!");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to ban..");
            }
        }[/code]

now, I want to change this to Admins, not mods.

If you’re an idiot at Java, Do NOT reply with change this line…

if (command.startsWith("ban") && playerRights > 0) {

Because if you’re smart, you know that’s not P Rights. If that was to change P rights, you’d have >=. not >.

So can someone explain?
[size=30pt]+[/size]

Read full topic
